summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FlowState beats/instrumental making app. Backend APIs are fully functional with 84.6% success rate. Frontend UI and authentication flows working correctly with proper routing and user experience.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Cosmetic - both status codes indicate authentication failure

passed_tests: Landing page loads with proper styling and navigation
Get current user with /api/auth/me endpoint and authentication
Get user projects list via /api/projects GET
Frontend routing between landing, login, register, dashboard pages
Protected routes correctly redirect to login when unauthenticated
Dashboard displays projects after successful login
Create project dialog works with genre selection
Studio page loads correctly for a project with all UI elements
Logout functionality works and clears authentication
All interactive buttons are clickable and properly integrated
